name: Tatul Avoyan
description: '''Tatul Frunziki Avoyan'''{{efn|name=spelling|{{bulleted list|{{langx|hy|Թաթուլ Ֆրունզիկի Ավոյան|{{transliteration|hy|ALA|Tʻatʻul Frunziki Avoyan}}}}|Known commonly by his mononym '''Tatul''' or '''Tatoul'''}}}} (born August 20, 1964) is an [[Armenians|Armenian]] singer of [[Rabiz (music genre)|rabiz]] music.
